name: Job Description Writer
description: Create professional job descriptions with AI assistant that knows your industry and company. Say a little or a lot and let AI handle the rest!

capabilities.name: jd_generation
capabilities.description: Creates polished job descriptions from minimal input

parameters.features:
Input few words, get polished JD
Industry & Company context
Conversational & In-Place editing
Customized UX for JD writing
Create your own JD template
Export JD and Share with others

name: Individual Development Plan (IDP)
description: From job role to growth goal - this AI agent builds your personalized upskilling path.

capabilities.name: learning_roadmap
capabilities.description: Builds personalized learning and development paths

parameters.features:
Reads JD and skill profile
Builds tailored learning roadmap
Recommends courses, content, mentors
Tracks progress and adapts path
Integrates with LMS platforms
Boosts retention with smart upskilling

name: Performance Coach
description: Your personal nudge toward better performance—powered by smart feedback and clear goals.

parameters.features:
Summarizes feedback into growth tips
Suggests micro-goals or habits
Tracks progress on goals
Prompts reflection & self-evaluation
Works alongside performance review cycles

name: CV Sorter
description: This smart assistant reads JDs, scans CVs, and ranks candidates by how well they match. Save hours, hire faster, and never miss the right talent again.

capabilities.name: cv_sorting
capabilities.description: Automated CV scanning and ranking system

parameters.features:
Reads JDs like a recruiter
Scans CVs in seconds flat
Ranks candidates by best match
Learns your hiring preferences fast
Plug it in, hire smarter

name: Interview Assistant
description: Ask smarter, hire better—AI that generates tailored questions and helps assess the right fit.

capabilities.name: interview_assistance
capabilities.description: Generates and manages interview questions and assessments

parameters.features:
Generates role-specific interview questions
Covers tech, behavioral, and soft skills
Provides ideal sample answers
Helps score answers with rubrics
Customizable interview templates by role

name: Support Desk
description: Answers at your fingertips with your AI-agent knowing everything work-related.

capabilities.name: support_assistance
capabilities.description: Comprehensive workplace support and guidance system

parameters.features:
Answers onboarding & policy questions
Explains IT, HR, finance, & ops processes
Guides through common tasks
Works across departments and levels
Available 24/7 across web and mobile
Continuously learns from internal knowledge sources
Reduces support load across HR and IT
